name: Scrap Metal (itch) (MashyZ)
description:
WASD to move. LMB to select a robot. The top 3 bars are your health. The bottom bar is your Gear Bar (XP). Slay enemies to gain XP, levelling up to craft more companions.

Help Build-R, an android sent to disposal for gaining sentience, as he fights his way through the enforcing robots. Build-R has peace built-in to his hardware, but that won't stop him from turning the opposition to scrap!

Liluo: https://liluo.io/mashyz/scrap-metal
